title: LAGGING???
body: This started happening last night when i wanted to play from getting off from work.  My fps is usually 60 to 80 running smoothly, but now its having jhin wrap five feet to leave the item store and takes about .2 for him to respond to my clicks. I really would like some help,

replies.body: This sounds like an input delay issue caused by a poor network connection, and not necessarily an FPS problem.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, where you'll find a list of steps to strengthen your connection.  I also recommend testing it out in custom games to prevent penalties.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!

i think im screwed. i tried the hextech repair kit, reinstall in patch, tested it out in three customs and nothing worked. aAso i reset my wifi and nothing, and i was just about to buy that project ekko skin feels bad man.

Take heart!  If the guide or repair weren't able to solve this, we can still help troubleshoot and rule out possibilities.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can dig into this.  The Hextech Repair Tool should have also provided a set of logs.  Attach it to the ticket for context, and we'll respond asap!
